news.title: UK could suspend visas for countries with no migrant return deals, new home secretary says
news.summary: Shabana Mahmood, who was appointed in last week's reshuffle, says her top priority is to 'secure' the UK's borders.

news.title: New Zealand dad shot dead by police after years on the run with children
news.summary: Tom Phillips disappeared with his three children in 2021 after losing a custody battle.

news.title: 'He put his hand down my tights': Sexual harassment widespread among barristers, review finds
news.summary: Widespread problems with sexual harassment and bullying within the Bar are detailed in a report.

news.title: New Banksy mural appears at Royal Courts of Justice
news.summary: The artwork, which shows a judge hitting a protester with a gavel, was confirmed by the elusive street artist.

news.title: Rayner replacement must be a woman, says Harman
news.summary: Labour's ruling National Executive Committee (NEC) is setting the rules for choosing the new deputy leader.

news.title: Huge drugs bust reveals battles on cocaine 'superhighway'
news.summary: An audacious attempt to smuggle tonnes of cocaine was stopped, but pressure from drug cartels remains.

news.title: Five key moments from MTV VMAs as Lady Gaga and Ariana Grande win big
news.summary: Sabrina Carpener was also among the award winners and performers on the night in New York.

news.title: Mushroom murder survivor's plea to grieve away from the spotlight as wife's killer jailed
news.summary: As Erin Patterson was sentenced, her sole surviving victim Ian Wilkinson called for privacy and kindness.

news.title: 'Don't be afraid': The self-written note that inspired Alcaraz to latest US Open triumph
news.summary: Before the US Open, Carlos Alcaraz told himself to "go for it, don't be afraid". He lived by that motto as he went on to take the title.

news.title: The football wonderkids who didn't make it in the Premier League
news.summary: The Premier League has a history of young players making it big - which has continued this season - but not every starlet has followed up their bright start.
